definition: to break down/to break into pieces/fragmentary
meat/flesh/pulp (of a fruit)/(coll.) (of a fruit) squashy/(of a person) flabby/irresolute/Kangxi radical 130

sentences.english: White bean cannelloni salad with red, green, and yellow peppers with tomato concasse.
sentences.chinese: 白豆碎肉沙拉伴紅椒，綠椒和黃椒，番茄碎。

sentences.english: Once she had fed him morsels of charred meat from her own hand.
sentences.chinese: 曾經她還用自己的手來喂他碎肉。

sentences.english: Soon I was chopsticking shredded pork with green chilies into my mouth, and chasing it with stir-fried white cabbage.
sentences.chinese: 很快我用筷子伴着青椒的碎肉，和幹炒白菜進嘴裏。

sentences.english: Add the chicken mince and continue tossing in the wok until the chicken is cooked through.
sentences.chinese: 添加雞碎肉並繼續在鍋裏翻煮，直到雞肉燒熟。

sentences.english: She had a hot mince pie for him.
sentences.chinese: 她給他做了熱碎肉餡餅。

definition: minced meat sauce/(fig.) mincemeat/a person cut to pieces
to be badly mangled or mutilated (idiom)
flesh and blood flying (idiom); carnage/people blown to pieces
rain of blood/heavy rain colored by loess sandstorm
